text: Gonzalo Higuaín (born 10 December 1987) is an Argentine football player who plays as a striker. He plays for Inter Miami and Argentina national team. He is nicknamed El Pipita. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== Appearances and goals by club, season and competitionHiguain Statistics . Retrieved 30 October 2008.
